```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>",
  eval = TRUE
)
```

## Load Data
  
```{r report}
data <- load_data(system.file("extdata", "data.csv", package = "demoProject1"))
data |>
    head() |>
    knitr::kable()
```

## Summarise Data
  
```{r summary_age}
data_clean <- filter_complete(data, "age")
summarise_parameter(data_clean, "age")
```
  
```{r summary_bmi}
summarise_parameter(data_clean, "bmi")
```


## Add Session Info

```{r session_info}
sessionInfo()
```
